title: AIML-421: Build Contrast Application Identifier agent
description: Parent bead for building a Pydantic AI agent that identifies which Contrast application corresponds to a repository. Core implementation complete, needs GitHub setup, testing, and refinement.

title: Add end-to-end test with real repository
description: Create E2E test that runs against a known repository (like mcp-contrast) and verifies correct application identification

title: Test against multiple repository types
description: Manually test the agent against Java/Maven, Node.js, and Python repositories to verify it works across different tech stacks

title: Add integration tests for MCP connections
description: Write integration tests that verify filesystem MCP and Contrast MCP connections work correctly. Test tool discovery and invocation.
close_reason: Integration tests complete. Fixed MCP import error, added 7 passing tests covering filesystem MCP, Contrast MCP, config, and mock scenarios. All quality gates passed.

title: Create GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD
description: Add workflow that runs tests on PR and provides example of how to use the tool in GitHub Actions

title: Create GitHub repository and push initial code
description: Create new repository under JacobMagesHaskinsContrast organization, configure settings, and push initial implementation
close_reason: GitHub repository created successfully at https://github.com/JacobMagesHaskinsContrast/contrast-app-identifier and initial code pushed. Repository configured with topics.
